title: 2000 Ford F-550 XL Super Duty
item_description:
2000 Ford F-550 XL Super Duty

Specifications

  • Year: 2000
  • Make: Ford
  • Model: F-550 XL Super Duty
  • VIN: 1FDAF56F1YEE09596
  • License: 61080A2
    • Registration Expiration: 6/30/2020
    • 10/07/19 ARB NON-COMPLIANT VEHICLE
  • Odometer Reads: 77,430
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 19,000 Lbs
  • Body Style: Utility Truck
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 225/70R19.5

  • Wall Height: 44”

Interior

Note: Seller purchased the vehicle in 2021 but did not complete the transfer. Seller has the original signed title from registered owner. The Certificate of Title and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
